---
title: "Unlock Labs Upgrades Apple Wallet and Google Wallet Passes"
subtitle: ""
authorName: "Unlock Protocol"
publishDate: "Wed Jul 31 2024 23:04:56 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)"
description: "Unlock Protocol tickets, subscriptions, memberships, and certifications now can be directly added to Apple Wallet and Google Wallet, significantly enhancing their convenience."
image: "/images/blog/unlock-labs-upgrades-apple-wallet-and-google-wallet-passes/c49a63d71556df5e4f3c3e4841acacec.jpg"
---

![Unlock Labs Upgrades Apple Wallet and Google Wallet Passes](https://storage.googleapis.com/papyrus_images/c49a63d71556df5e4f3c3e4841acacec.jpg)

<p>Unlock Protocol tickets, subscriptions, memberships, and certifications now can be directly added to Apple Wallet and Google Wallet, significantly enhancing their convenience.</p><p>This new feature enables users to easily add their passes to their digital wallets at issuance, or at any time via the Unlock Keychain.</p><p>Tickets come equipped with scannable QR codes, making event entry and verification a breeze.</p><figure float="none" width="365px" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: 365px;"><img src="/images/blog/unlock-labs-upgrades-apple-wallet-and-google-wallet-passes/28188e7a7b0dcdee433cd7946856c756.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="1920" nextwidth="1080" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><p>While most frequently used for tickets, this integration also extends to subscriptions and memberships, expanding the potential uses of Unlock Protocol-powered digital passes.</p><p>Anyone can quickly add an Unlock-powered membership passes to their phone's wallet. By integrating with Apple Wallet and Google Wallet, Unlock Protocol is continuing to focus on convenience and ease-of-use for digital memberships.</p>
